targets.query: SELECT "Event.action" AS action FROM "isy" WHERE "Event.node.name" =~ /Family -/ AND "Event.node.name" !~ /Hall|Kitchen|Outdoor/ AND "Event.node" =~ / 1$/ AND "Event.control" = 'ST' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "Event.node.name"
